name: N.E.X.O.R.
overview: Nemesis Experimental and Operational Research. The Andromedans are the enemy planned to defeat with the NEMESIS weapon. Each NEMESIS device is constructed from five modules, and there are ten modules to make two devices. These must not be taken by the invading Andromedan troops, nor must the blueprints, held on magnetic tape. Ge the Matter Transfer Beam working before time runs out.
